-e ---

🐪 dromedary camel 🐫 bactrian camel

🐪 𒃵𒂷 gammal camel < καμπούρα kampoúra "hump(back)" <> gamma 𒄑𒉽𒈿 ĝeš gam₃ #gamlu : 𒄘𒁄𒄑𒆕𒀀 gu₂ᵐbal-ĝiš-du₃-a "hump" guᵐbal <> Kuppel cupola Kübel “cup”

𒁲𒁉𒀉 di-bi-id dibid dia²pod deve "camel" <> toe 𒁲𒁉𒀉 ti-bi-id тибе tibe twi²feed tebe@Turk тӗве tĕve ᵗʔibil إِبِل дөйә 驼 tuó туә tuə "camel" <> toe

🐫 twi²peak? twi²Buckel humpbacked camel

𒄠𒋛𒄮𒊏𒀭 AM.SI.ḪAR.RA.AN (𒄞𒆳𒋛𒄮𒊏𒀭 rolled out?)

🐪 ≈ 𓃘 ≈ 𒀲 in 𒁲𒁉𒀉 dromedary 𒁲𒁉𒁕 turbota swelling "hump" @ 🐪 •tir-bi-da 𒁲𒁉𒁕 donkey

𒁲 DI ≈ 𒁺 DU ≈ do in 𒁲𒁉𒁕 donkey 𓃘 𔑯𔑰𔑱𔑲 𔑰 te/de donkey tête Tier
